title: Outlook: RSVP improvements in event context menu in new Outlook for Windows and web
description: Changes to the event's right-click context menu will make it easier to respond to meeting invitations from the Calendar surface. All RSVP options will be on the first level of the menu. There will be also separate options to respond to either all events in the series or just the current instance. This update will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web. #newOutlookforWindows
